name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **API** development, **Scalability**, and **Systems Design**. Adept in **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, **Go**, and **TypeScript**, ensuring robust backend services. Specialized in observability and incident response, I excel in creating resilient and maintainable infrastructures. Experienced in leveraging cloud-native platforms while implementing microservices architecture.
Additionally, I bring hands-on expertise in AI/ML-powered solutions with knowledge in **Python** and cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**. I possess a strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring solutions align with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
